title: Celebs who kept 'investigating' eyes on their spouses
text:
Being a celeb means a constant public glare and thus most celeb relations become easy targets of scrutiny. 

READ: Brian Austin Green seeking spousal support from Megan Fox 

But there are celebs who have gone a step ahead and kept their exes or spouses under constant watch to keep a tab on their `activities.' The latest to join the bandwagon is Megan Fox, who wants to keep a sharp eye on the activities of her ex-husband Austin Green. Here are few more who did the same:

MEGAN FOX ON BRIAN AUSTIN GREEN (2015) 





While Megan Fox was fighting a custody battle with ex-husband Austin Green, who demanded spouse support on account of his inability to work due to an injury , Megan has decided to keep an eye on his activities since she feels he has been `rather too active' recently to be able to not work, and his claim of inability to work is not true.

BEYONCE ON JAY Z (2015) 



While Beyonce and Jay Z have been together for a long time and all seems fine, there have been reports that Beyonce recently hired a private investigator to keep an eye on Jay while she is away and report back to her on whatever Jay is doing.

Sources, reportedly, have spelt trouble in paradise.

KHLOE KARDASHIAN ON LAMAR ODOM (2013) 




Khloe might have been the first one to reach by his side in the hospital after his recent collapse due to drug overdose, but when they were married, Khloe had hired a tail to find evidence against Lamar for cheating on her. And the results were quite what she had expect ed, Lamar was found to have as many as five mistresses.

MARIA SHRIVER ON ARNOLD SCHWARZENEGGER (2011) 




What ended as one of the most expensive divorce settlements between Maria Shriver and Arnold Schwarzenegger, started with Maria hiring a private investigator (PI) to find out how much did Arnold worth and how much money she was dealing with. Arnold's flamboyant spending on his illegitimate family only added fuel to the fire.

BRITNEY SPEARS ON KEVIN FEDERLINE (2007) 


Custody battles can really get dirty, and the same happened with Britney Spears, who hired a private investigator for keeping an eye on Kevin Federline's activities. Britney wanted to use Kevin's unruly behavior as an evidence in the court to get the custody of her children.

VENESSA BRYANT ON KOBE BRYANT (2011) 


It all started in 2003 when Kobe was accused of raping a 19 year old hotel staff, but he refused saying it was `consensual.' Since then Vanessa knew her husband was a cheater, but she wait ed for the right time to hit back. She hired a PI in 2011 to gather enough evidence to file for a divorce and get the right amount of alimony .

JUANITA JORDAN ON MICHAEL JORDAN (1988) 

The legendary basketball player Michael Jordan found himself out of sorts when his long time wife Juanita Vanoy filed for divorce citing `irreconcilable difference.' While the trouble had started long back in their marriage, Juanita hired a PI much later to gether all the right evi dences to win her an amicable divorce.
